hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select {Product.*} from products as Product where sku in (SELECT TOP 5 SKU FROM CustomerEvents WHERE CustomerID=:ID GROUP BY SKU ORDER BY MAX(EventDate) DESC)

select {Category.*} from categories as Category where CategoryID in (SELECT TOP 5 CategoryID FROM CustomerEvents WHERE CategoryID IS NOT NULL AND CustomerID=:ID GROUP BY CategoryID ORDER BY COUNT(EventID) DESC)
